ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Animals Overhaul Reloaded
ModMetaData.author: kaptain_kavern | Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
Overhaul of Vanilla animals. Caravan animals, wool growth, egg laying, and more.
My Credits: -kaptain_kavern for the original mod -🦉 owl for Westerado compatibility -Ludeon Forum user "Caffeine Zombie" for the original RimWorld v1.0 update
Original Mod Author's Thanks/Credits: -A big Thank you to Oblitus : For fixing "pack animals" to be buyable -Most Horns/Antlers graphics were made by Coercion originally for the TropiCKAPP Rainforest mod -Also Mehni for pointing me to an error with the changes I made with cats behavior changes
